definition: generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more

sentences.english: That's true.And more Chinese step on the cover of "Times".
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，而且越來越多的中國人登上了時代週刊封面。

sentences.english: Food and water ran short, power blacked out.
sentences.chinese: 食物和水越來越少，電力也被切斷了。

sentences.english: But the consensus around the Gulf Coast is turning more apoplectic and apocalyptic.
sentences.chinese: 但在墨西哥灣海岸的輿論正變得越來越激烈和末世論。

sentences.english: Her behaviour became increasingly erratic, and she was often drunk on stage.
sentences.chinese: 她的行爲越來越古怪，有時在舞臺上都是醉醺醺的。

sentences.english: The Slow Year Movement is becoming increasingly popular.
sentences.chinese: “慢活運動”正在全球吸引越來越多的參與者。

sentences.english: An increasing number of people are realising the neccesity to protect enviroment.
sentences.chinese: 世界上越來越多的人認識到加強環境保護的必要性。

sentences.english: Self-publishing these days is increasingly a tale of two cities.
sentences.chinese: 今自助出版越來越呈現兩極分化的趨勢。

sentences.english: I'm getting a double chin. I'd better lose some weight.
sentences.chinese: 我雙下巴越來越明顯，最好減肥。

sentences.english: Increasingly, however, it is the Chinese who play Africans off against each other.
sentences.chinese: 然而，是中國人越來越多地操縱非洲人之間相互作對。

sentences.english: Thing is, headphones don’t offer much warmth and getting cold ears isn’t fun.
sentences.chinese: 問題是，耳機不能保暖，耳朵越來越冷這就不好玩了。

sentences.english: Phil is becoming more and more desperate, because she has been out of work for 3months.
sentences.chinese: 菲爾已三個月沒有找到工作了，正變得越來越絕望。

sentences.english: Short hair is gaining in popularity although men are supporting a variety of hairstyles.
sentences.chinese: 儘管男人們是不同髮式的擁躉，短髮卻越來越受歡迎。

sentences.english: The issue becomes vaguer because of the same origin of space and life.
sentences.chinese: 這個問題已經越來越模糊了，因爲其實兩者本屬同根。

sentences.english: Just adding it and filling up our containers with more and more stuff.
sentences.chinese: 往我們的容器裏增加，裝上越來越多的東西。

sentences.english: Lydgate found it more and more agreeable to be with her.
sentences.chinese: 利德蓋特越來越覺得，跟她在一起趣味無窮。

definition: increasingly/more and more/ever more/all the more
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
